评论详情: Me encanta tiene muchos espacios, buen material.

This is a surprisingly nice bag. Really nice leather and nice fit. It you are someone who doesn’t require a label and walks a lot and wants to feel secure I highly recommend this bag. Very roomy and secure.
Perfect for intended use with real pebble leather…Just the size for keys, wallet, re-usable shopping bag… Has gone into courtroom, over to the gym, and now on a driving vacation…

I travel a lot and like a smaller bag, less expensive, that will fit in my tote. This easily fits my phone, brush, lipstick, cards and more. Don’t like carrying my designer bags for travel for two reasons, makes me a target and the wear and tear is too great.

It’s a crossbody.  There’s only one thing wrong with this, it’s so stiff it hurts your arm to wear crossbody..  longer strap, it stick out too far.  It longs to be a shoulder purse but it’s strap is designed crossbody and not good on shoulder.  It’s too late to return.
Ilove this bag so much. It gold so much. The quality is amazing

As a Mom of 3 littles, I live in crossbody bags.  I like the sling bag idea, but the popular ones are so athleisure and don't really coordinate with my outfits and style.  I've purchased and returned several options but this one is a keeper!!  The taupe color is different but still neutral.  The fabric feels pebbly and upscale.  The style is versatile and can be dressed up or down.  It is big enough to carry my essentials plus some items for the kids, but not too big that I feel like I'm carrying the world.  This is my version of a perfect sling bag!  Highly recommend!
Quality leather sling bag. The color and fit are awesome. Thick leather for durability. Love this bag will definitely be one of my go too's!

评论概述: Stitching that connects bag to straps
评论详情: I ordered this bag in black and beige. The black bag stitching is done very well but the beige is not, I am going to have to return the beige even though I love the color. Hopefully they will fix this issue with the beige bag stitching, because if so I would buy the beige again.
Great for price
A must have.

I had been eyeing the COS bag but didn't want to spend $100+ on a occassional for me bag (travel, festivals, etc). I don't mind the grained leather in this version, I wanted a sling with wide strap. My first order had puckering along the zipper; the leather had a dry texture and it didn't fold nicely at the corners. I exchanged it and the second one was nicer quality.  The bag is roomy and the strap length is adequate for me (5'4", medium build). I can feel the lump where the strap adjusts, it's fine with a thicker top or sweater. May not be comfortable with a t-shirt for long periods of time. The thicker leather is a bit stiff to wear as a crescent shoulder bag; works fine as sling. Overall it's a keeper.

I really like this bag. The strap is long enough to wear it over your shoulder or wear it as a Crossbody, which is exactly what I was looking for. The actual department section of the bag is a little bit smaller than I had hoped for, but the structure, soft and durability will last forever.
Get so many compliments on it. Love it!
every day bag. slightly small but i still live it

I needed a crossbody bag for my Paris trip. I wasn't expecting good quality for $60 leather bag. Leather is really nice and I love the color of this bag. Size is perfect for eu trip. 100% worth the money!

评论概述: Holds so much more than expected!
评论详情: All of my junk fits and it's not tetris'd in there! It smells nice, like new leather as it should. Zipper seems sturdy, love that the strap does not come apart so it is safe from bag snatchers. I'm a very big girl, 213 lbs at 5'10" and it's almost too loose on the last notches.  It's not bulky at all, I was worried it would stick out and look weird but nope.  It seems really sturdy so it should last for years with normal day to day use.  I love it!!  Looks pricey without the dent in my bank account!
The perfect bag! Wish I could buy this every color!

Yes, she’s that bag - a dupe for the COS bag but half the price, more color options, and in my opinion, better leather (pebbled leather is more durable than smooth leather). Has the amazing leather smell when you first open it. The strap is nicely adjustable. I’m 5’5”, and it easily hits me around the waist/hip comfortably. I also like that the zipper is very smooth and hides away, making the bag seem more expensive than it is. Unlike the COS bag, the interior is lined with a light canvas fabric, so it’s easier to find things and easier to clean.
I have this bag from COS in beige…it’s literally exactly the same and less than a quarter of the price! WISH they’d do a metallic version 🙏🏻
Great quality leather crossbody and easy to wear.  Love the price too!
Loved it but strap too short so returned.

I absolutely love this handbag! I've had it for a few weeks now. The weather is nice, and it's easy to wear and adjustable. It fits a lot of essentials, plus some. The black leather is really pretty and the quality seems on par.
This bag is excellent quality.  Genuine leather and well-constructed.  The crescent sling shape is very in style right now, and my college-aged daughter loves this.  Great bag!

Great bag. Made well. The right size. It’s not too big.  Not too small either. It’s the perfect size bag for me. I also love that when you wear the bag the zipper is turned into you chest so that no one can open it without you knowing. Would definitely buy again.

Lovely little bag, I’ve been looking for one like it for ages. Small, simple well made bag with enough space for a phone, glasses, wallet and other small essentials. It is going to go everywhere with me! At £59.99 I think it’s good value for a leather bag. Similar item on the High St is £119 (Mint Velvet). Came well packaged, very happy with my purchase and already considering another colour.
Well liked by recipient
Beautiful bag, looks & feels high end...very happy!
Lovely bag already have the brown one
Love this bag with low price. 😍🥰 I think i need big size of this will be so much better 😘

I absolutely love this bag. The quality is fantastic, inside and out, and the leather is beautiful. Carries and sits really nicely and is a gorgeous shade of blue. Very happy with my purchase which arrived a lot earlier than expected.
It is a great bag! Very good quality and very functional and comfortable to carry.

I was pleasantly suprised when the bag arrived. I wanted a small bag to hold valuables when travelling, and this cross-body design feels safer. The strap is wide and adjustable, and it holds more than I expected. Being made from leather, is is now my everyday bag. The minimalist design is pleasing, and it feels sturdy and likely to last well. I might get other colours now.
